thread.title: Sandra Bernhard on Defying Critics and Staying Relevant

author: wsjcom
title: Sandra Bernhard on Defying Critics and Staying Relevant
text:
Sandra Bernhard isn’t afraid to speak her mind.
The comedian, social activist and radio host explains how she’s defied her critics and stayed relevant for decades in the often-fickle entertainment business in this week’s Secrets of Wealthy Women podcast with Veronica Dagher.
Ms. Bernhard, who appears in the revival of the hit sitcom “Roseanne,”... To Read the Full Story Subscribe Sign In
